title: Filthy
description: She captivates me the second I lay eyes on her.Everything about her is pure, delicate beauty, and in my world, those things are commodities.Even Aoife can be bought and sold. Even Aoife has secrets that will see her getting into bed with the Irish Mob to protect.The truth won't set her free, it will entangle her deeper in my web.Exactly where I want her.One taste was all it took.She's mine.Whether she likes it or not...This is Finn O'Grady's story.
author: Serena Akeroyd
